product_name: Arc'teryx Beta SL Rain Pants - Womens
long_description: Don't let the rain keep you from venturing out onto the trails. The Arc'teryx Beta SL pants are lightweight, waterproof and breathable to let you enjoy wet weather to its fullest. 2.5-layer Gore-Tex(R) PacLite(R) is engineered specifically to be light, packable and more breathable than other 2- or 3-layer Gore Tex fabrics. Instep and hems are reinforced with 3-layer Gore-Tex Pro(R) Shell fabric, providing extra abrasion resistance to high-wear areas. Light and compact fabric combines durable wind- and waterproof protection with exceptional breathability. Pull-on style with elasticized waistband saves weight and ensures a comfortable fit; lower leg zippers accommodate boots. Articulated knees and seat on the Arc'teryx Beta SL pants enhance fit and anticipate wear patterns for long-lasting durability.
short_description: Don't let the rain keep you from venturing out onto the trails. The Arc'teryx Beta SL pants are lightweight, waterproof and breathable to let you enjoy wet weather to its fullest.
